channel.title: Fuck. Yes
channel.description:
After 9 years of waiting, a new monkey island game coming out tomorrow.
http://www.telltalegames.com/monkeyisland
If you were deprived as a child and did not play the monkey island series, kindly do so now. Right now.
I pre ordered it, the first game I've paid for in years. Will post how much it kicks ass tomorrow when I play it after work, though I am considering calling in sick.
The secret of monkey island (first game) is also being remade with better graphics, dialog, sound etc etc.
http://www.lucasarts.com/games/monkeyisland/

item.title: Fuck. Yes
item.dc:creator: @Original_Daniel Original Daniel
item.description:
@Original_Daniel wrote:

[quote=“Man UTD Freak, post:10, topic:287439”][quote author=the bank link=topic=380070.msg2859128#msg2859128 date=1247063381]

What about Worms World Party? I used to play that a lot.
[/quote]That’s just weird…

It’s called opinion. You and others may think it weird but in my opinion I think differently.[/quote]

ofc it’s his opinion, he said it didn’t he?

edit:I forgot about this thread…

The last episode came out a couple months ago and the game is pretty awesome. It definitely lives up to the MI standard.

They are doing a new sam and max atm but a new MI is coming.

Plus lechucks revenge SE is coming out

http://ve3d.ign.com/articles/news/53654/Monkey-Island-2-LeChucks-Revenge-Special-Edition-Announced

Read full topic
